attributes.action: Listed Building Status For The Homes of The Former Beatles
attributes.additional_details: English Heritage have listed the former homes of John Lennon and Sir Paul McCartney as Grade II listed buildings. The former homes of Ringo Starr (9 Madryn Street) and George Harrison (12 Arnold Grove) remain unlisted. This petition is to encourage HM Government to list Madryn Street, which has been approved for demolition and Arnold Grove.
